caption.p: Effect of the inclusion of pomegranate pulp in the diet of lactating ewes on the antioxidant capacity of milk expressed as (Î¼M Trolox Equivalent/g). CTRL = control concentrate, PP = concentrate containing 64% pomegranate pulp, H-ORAC = antioxidant capacity of milk hydrophilic fraction, L-ORAC = antioxidant capacity of milk lipophilic fraction, TAC = total antioxidant capacity of milk (H-ORAC + L-ORAC).
